mapper.sql: check_id, whouse_id, storage_code, sku_count, remark, state, enterprise_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_user_name, modify_date, last_modify_date
mapper.select: select t.check_id, t.whouse_id, t.storage_code, t.sku_count, t.remark, t.state, t.enterprise_id, t.create_user_id, t.create_user_name, t.create_date, t.modify_user_id, t.modify_user_name, t.modify_date, t.last_modify_date ,(select w.whouse_name from public.t_erp_warehouse w where w.whouse_id = t.whouse_id) as whouseName from public.t_erp_whouse_check t where t.check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.state = 1
mapper.insert: insert into public.t_erp_whouse_check (check_id, whouse_id, storage_code, sku_count, remark, state, enterprise_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_user_name, modify_date, last_modify_date) values (#{checkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{whouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update public.t_erp_whouse_check
whouse_id = #{whouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
storage_code = #{storageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_count = #{skuCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update public.t_erp_whouse_check set whouse_id = #{whouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, storage_code = #{storageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_count = #{skuCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t.check_id, t.whouse_id, t.storage_code, t.sku_count, t.remark, t.state, t.enterprise_id, t.create_user_id, t.create_user_name, t.modify_user_id, t.modify_user_name, t.modify_date, t.last_modify_date ,to_char(t.create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_date , whouse_name from public.t_erp_whouse_check t left join public.t_erp_warehouse ew on t.whouse_id = ew.whouse_id where t.state = 1 and t.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ew.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and t.whouse_id = CAST(#{search.whouse_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS BIGINT)
and t.create_date >= #{search.startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}::timestamp
and t.create_date <= #{search.endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}::timestamp
order by t.last_modify_date desc
